content: p1* to end k1 p1 ssk p1 *k1 p1* to last 4 sts k2tog p1 k1 repeat until you have increased 5 times you now have 41 sts on the needles ending after a row 1 you now have 81 sts on the needles row 5 rs p1 *k1 p1* to end removing raglan markers ws *p1 k1* 2 times p across front panel to m raglan setup ws - placing markers rm p1 sm p across sleeve to m sm p1 p9 pm p1 pm p1 pm p1 pm p17 pm p1 rm p across back to m rm p1 sm p pm p1 pm p1 pm p9 to end across sleeve to m sm p1 rm p across front panel to last 4 sts *k1 p1* to end raglan repeat row 1 - increase row rs 4 markers have been removed 4 markers *k1 p1* 2 times k to m m1r sm k1 sm remain you now have from right to left m1l k to m m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to m 15 sts for front m 11 sts for sleeve m 29 sts m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to m m1r sm k1 for back m 11 sts for sleeve m and 15 sts sm m1l k to last 4 sts *p1 k1* to end for front increased 8 sts sleeve increase repeat tightly bobble all sts on the ws working the row 1 - increase row rs k sts as knits and the p sts as purls *k1 p1* 2 times k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm k to m sm m1l k to m m1r sm sleeves k to last 4 *p1 k1* to end place 17 sleeve sts back on the needles increased 4 sts knit all sts pick up 1 st in the underarm row 2 ws pm for bor *p1 k1* 2 times p to last 4 sts slipping you now have 18 sts on the needles markers as you go *k1 p1* to end ribbed cuff repeat repeat 3 times total ending after a ws *k1 p1* to end row you now have 93 sts on the needles 17 sts repeat for 4 row total per sleeve bobble all sts working the k sts as knits and splitting sleeves rs the p sts as purls *k1 p1* 2 times k to m rm place 17 sleeve sts on hold rm co 1 st k to m rm place repeat all steps for the second sleeve 17 sleeve sts on hold rm co 1 st k to last starting from sleeves 4 *p1 k1* to end you now have 61 sts on the needles finishing | blocking optional body repeat weave in ends soak in lukewarm water row 1 ws for at least 15 minutes gently wring out *p1 k1* 2 times p to last 4 sts *k1 p1* to excess water until it is just damp end arrange the collar to be folded or
